attributes.additional_details:
It is insane that a free will democracy like ours still does not  give the sick people the medicine they need. Marijuana  has unbelievable medicinal values that are being kept away from the people who need them the most.  I.E  - M.S SUFFERS , AIDS SUFFERS, CANCER PATEINTS , GLAUCOMA , MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS ,ALZHEIMERS DISEASE  And the list goes on.
We need to allow the sick to have access to the medicine they need .
